user.name: Aman
user.short_desc: Hi, I'm Aman, a software engineer with passions and expertise in developing mobile and web apps.

services.name: Web App Development
services.desc: Enterprise level web application development & deployment using modern technologies such as React.js, Next.js, Redux, Node.js, express.js, rest apis, graphql apis and others...

services.name: App Development
services.desc: Enterprise level Mobile Application development & deployment either using native tech like Kotlin, jetpack etc. or using cross-platform tech like react-native, flutter etc...

services.name: Malware Development
services.desc: Development of malware for devices or trackers which can give you more information about the user with or without their consent...

services.name: Server Development
services.desc: Enterprise level server development & deployment using modern technologies such as Node.js, express.js, nest.js, django, flask, rocket, actix, rest apis, graphql apis and others...

services.name: DevOps
services.desc: Deployment and management of resources on various cloud platforms like azure, aws, gcp with container services like Docker, kubernetes alongwith the useof terraform...

data.name: Code Notebook: code-editor in cloud
data.desc1: Code Notebook is an ide in the cloud for developers mostly used for private-repos which is secured and authorised only to specific members or devs can use it personally when they don't have their local ide in hand and need to work on any project in the cloud
data.desc2: It's built using Modern Next.js and can compile all types of code with support for language specific syntax highlighting, git support, auto-formatting and auto-completion and multiple other features
